name: Blockbench 3D Model
summary: Learn about .BBMODEL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: 3D artists typically use Blockbench to create and edit 3D models featured in video games, including Minecraft. The BBMODEL file is the primary file type associated with Blockbench.
When you save a 3D model project by selecting File → Save Project As, you preserve your work in the BBMODEL file. After saving the project, you can close and reopen it for further editing.

instructions: You can open BBMODEL files with Blockbench (multiplatform). For example, to open a BBMODEL file, select File → Open Model.

Since BBMODEL files contain plain text, you can also open them with a text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad, Apple TextEdit, or gedit. However, opening BBMODEL files with a text editor will appear different from opening them with Blockbench.
Blockbench can convert BBMODEL files to various file types, including the following formats:
